choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, and cashews
### Assistant:

Here is your 7 day menu. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the meals, I am happy to help! 
 Day 1 Breakfast : 2 eggs with mushrooms & spinach Lunch : Chicken salad sandwich Dinner : Grilled chicken breast and zucchini noodles Snack : Almonds  Day 2 Breakfast: Oatmeal w/ blueberries + almond milk Lunch: Turkey burger on whole wheat bun, avocado slices, cucumber slices. Side of steamed broccoli & cauliflower Dinner: Chicken thighs with roasted sweet potatoes and green beans Day 3 Breakfast: Blueberry pancakes (made from scratch) topped with maple syrup  Lunch : Leftover turkey burger sandwich Snack 1: Almonds + apple Lunch 2: Turkey meatball sub on whole wheat bun, side of steamed broccoli & cauliflower Dinner: Chicken thighs and roasted sweet potatoes Day 4 Breakfast: Oatmeal w/ blueberries + almond milk Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with zucchini noodles Snack 1 : Almonds  Lunch 2: Turkey burger on whole wheat bun Side of green beans, steamed broccoli & cauliflower Dinner: Chicken thighs and roasted sweet potatoes Day 5 Breakfast: Oatmeal w/ blueberries + almond milk Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with zucchini noodles Snack 1 : Almonds  Lunch 2: Turkey burger on whole wheat bun Side of green beans, steamed broccoli & cauliflower Dinner: Chicken thighs and roasted sweet potatoes Day 6 Breakfast: Oatmeal w/ blueberries + almond milk Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with zucchini noodles Snack 1 : Almonds  Lunch 2: Turkey burger on whole wheat bun Side of green beans, steamed broccoli & cauliflower Dinner: Chicken thighs and roasted sweet potatoes Day 7 Breakfast: Oatmeal w/ blueberries + almond milk Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with zucchini noodles Snack 1 : Almonds  Lunch 2: Turkey burger on whole wheat bun Side of green beans, steamed broccoli & cauliflower Dinner: Chicken thighs and roasted sweet potatoes
